TopicTitle: How to place landing gear horizontally

Articles.Content: I tried putting landing gear on a habitat module that is sideways but the always end up opposite of each other, any tips?
Try doing it in the SPH and transferring it over to the VAB? That might work
Alternatively, you could just use single symmetry and place the landing gear normally.
One of the features of the Ed Tools plugin by DEADBEEF lets you switch between mirror and symmetry mode quickly.
Attach the module somewhere on the rocket right side up, attach the landing legs to it, then move it to where you actually want it.
